property.name: heading
property.label: Heading
property.description: The heading text for the navigation section.

property.name: itemsJson
property.label: Navigation items (JSON)
property.description: JSON array of navigation items with label and href.

property.name: showTopBorder
property.label: Show top border
property.description: When true, displays a top border on the navigation.

property.name: skipLinkId
property.label: Skip link target ID
property.description: The ID of the element to skip to (without #). Defaults to 'skip-to-main'.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
